reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's quality, with one mentioning its sparkly gold thread snowflake motif, and they find it runs true to size with nice length for jeans.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday sweater!
items.body: The sweater is comfy and roomy. I love the retro look. Was a hit at the Christmas party I went to. PS: I ordered a XL but, should have ordered a large. However it still look great. Read more
items.author: Carla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful festive sweater
items.body: This pretty red sweater is festive with its sparkly gold thread snowflake motif and little gold threads interspersed throughout the front main body of the sweater. Plastic white "pearls" further decorate the snowflake. The cut of the sweater is below the waist which makes it a nice length for jeans, not boxy and not bulky around the middle. The sleeves are long enough for my long arms. The sweater weight is medium to heavy, with a tighter weave, so great for winter wear. The color is a bright true red. Read more
items.author: PammyG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Cute sweater. I got lots of compliments. It is warm and runs true to size. Only got four stars because the nose was sewn with one stitch and fell off half way through the first few hours at work. I pinned it on and fixed it when I got home. Read more
items.author: Prinny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described on website.
items.body: This sweater is very pretty on. I ordered a large and fits really nice. It's on the shorter side so if you are looking for longer and oversize you could size up. For reference, I am 5'3, around 170-175lbs, 38DDD. I ordered the large. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE
items.body: Fits true to size, super comfy with nice material and perfect for the holiday season. Read more
items.author: Mn nice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: This sweater is very cute, fabric is very nice and it has a very nice slightly oversized fit! I purchased a small. Read more
items.author: Sergio Ocanas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Sweater is super warm and cozy. Very comfortable and the material isn’t itchy! The description says oversized; normally I’m in between sizes small-medium. I did order a small and it does fit me well but if you want a true oversized look then I would recommend sizing up! Read more
items.author: Melissa Bruno

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality
items.body: The sweater’s material was so stiff, thin, and bad quality. I returned it the very next day. Read more
items.author: Evangeline Hsu

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green - Snowflake & Reindeer 2, Black - Christmas Tree, Black - Snowflake, Black - Fair Isle 2, Red - Reindeer, Green - Faie Isle 1, White - Snowflake & Reindeer, Green - Reindeer, Cream White -Christmas Patterns, Red - Snowflake & Reindeer, Cream White - Fair Isle 2, Red - Christmas Tree, Black - Christmas Stockings, Green - Christmas Stockings. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
